response.name: Unauthorized
A User without correct permission tried to fetch the alarm details.
alarm not found in database.

variable.description: (Required) Numeric ID of the Alarm to get

request.description: Update Alarm Status and RBP. Searches existing AlarmId. Returns a 404 error if the Id does not exist. Otherwise, updates the AlarmHistory table.

response.name: Returns Status message, status code and response message.
Unauthorized
A User without correct permission tried to update the Alarm.
alarm not found in database.

variable.description: (Required) Numeric ID of the Alarm to get

request.description: Updates AlarmHistory table to add comments in Comments column based on the AlarmId supplied. Searches existing AlarmId. Returns a 404 error if the Id does not exist. Otherwise, updates the AlarmHistory table.

response.name: Returns Status message, status code and response message.
Unauthorized
A User without correct permission tried to update the Alarm.
alarm not found in database.

item.name: Get alarm history details by ID and filter criteria

query.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set
The numbers of items to return
field name on which we want to sort the result
provide the order direction either ascending or descending
filter criteria return value greater than or equal to
